description: I’m a critic-at-large on the Culture desk. Here are five things I've been watching, reading and listening to.
title: What’s in Our Queue? ‘HeidiWorld’ and More
title_page: What’s in Our Queue? ‘HeidiWorld’ and More - The New York Times
maintext:
What’s in Our Queue? ‘HeidiWorld’ and More Amanda Hess �� In Brooklyn, looking for something new
I’m a critic-at-large on the Culture desk and have been feeling pretty persuadable in my cultural choices — everything I’m watching or reading right now comes from a friend’s recommendation or, like, a screenshot on Twitter.
Here are five favorites →
